ygData.subject: Re: Question for Befallen Buffs
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t know about Befallen.  However I can say that in Unrest it seems to be true.  We were in the Knight room, and one member of the party sat in the center of
ygData.messageBody:
Don't know about Befallen. However I can say that in Unrest it seems to
be true. We were in the Knight room, and one member of the party sat in
the center of the room where the spawn point is. we saw maybe 2 spawns
in 4 hours. After he left, we stood at the edges of the wall, and the
knight spawned twice in an hour. Take it for what you will. Your
mileage may vary

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jesper.Sallander@...
> [SMTP:Jesper.Sallander@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 10:55 AM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQCheats] Question for Befallen Buffs
>
> From: Jesper.Sallander@...
>
> Hi all. I have a question or two about the basement of Befallen...
>
> We went down in hopes of getting a BBC for our Pally last night. We
> were
> there for two hours or so, and never saw the SK. We were told that
> there is
> a "spawn line", ie, don't cross it or the SK will not spawn. Is this
> the
> case? If so, is that line at the end of the tunnel? Or inside the
> room?
> It was fairly frustrating. Also, there was another group there
> camping for
> the Robes, and I never saw that Theor..they...whatever guy that is
> supposed
> to drop the robes. Does the same thing apply for him?
>
> Lastly..how often would you say the SK would normally spawn? Every
> 1/2
> hour? Hour? 2 hours? I probably will not return to Befallen, unless
> it is
> with my Paladin with the objective of getting that BBC for him....so
> the
> info would be appreciated. That place is just swarming with DE's, and
> it
> makes my dwarven skin crawl.
>
> Thanks.
>
> Dameat
> 14th Level Dwarven Cleric (AND Master Brewer)
> Rodcet Nife
>
